"Urban Mop-up Operation":
"A state of emergency has been declared.
Darkers are occupying parts of the ARKS
Ship's urban sector. All ARKS members
are to immediately prepare for combat.
Break the occupation and exterminate all
Darkers within the urban sector.
――――――――――――――――――――
Collect [500] Quest Points by
exterminating Darkers.
Failure: Time limit expires"
